name: Holy Grail
headline: We capture CO2 from the atmosphere and store it above ground
description: Holy Grail removes carbon dioxide from the atmosphere to contribute to the long-term sustainability of humans and other species on Earth

HOLY GRAIL
[![Holy Grail](https://static.tildacdn.net/tild6632-3565-4538-b438-616531616138/holygrail_3.png)](https://www.holygrailcarbon.com/</>)

[![](https://static.tildacdn.net/tild3432-3263-4135-b862-653962346230/holygrail_3.png)](https://www.holygrailcarbon.com/</>)
  * [Home](https://www.holygrailcarbon.com/</>)
  * [Technology](https://www.holygrailcarbon.com/</technology>)
  * [Join](https://www.holygrailcarbon.com/</join>)
  * [Contact](https://www.holygrailcarbon.com/</contact>)


Tangible and durable carbon removal
Our technology removes CO2 from the atmosphere and permanently stores it above ground
![](https://optim.tildacdn.net/tild3430-3662-4634-a136-643638343363/-/resize/758x/-/format/webp/noroot.png)
Mineralized CO2 captured in Mountain View, CA 
Our modular scrubbers remove CO2 from the atmosphereusing electricity
The scrubbers are designed for lean manufacturing and rapid deployment with minimal labor
**How we capture CO 2**
![](https://optim.tildacdn.net/tild3235-3138-4132-b239-653861623133/-/resize/698x/-/format/webp/scrubbydubbasesymblu.png)
CO2 is mineralized and formed into bricks
**How we store CO 2**
The above-ground mineral formations are monitored to ensure the CO2 stays permanently stored

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Holy Grail**

Holy Grail is a bold venture with a resolute mission: to capture carbon dioxide (CO2) from the atmosphere and secure it above ground. Founded in 2019, this Y Combinator Batch S19 startup is rooted in Mountain View, California, where a compact team of 7 fervently works on tackling one of our era's most pressing challenges—climate change.

Their approach is innovative. The technology they employ focuses on tangible and durable carbon removal. Using modular scrubbers powered by electricity, Holy Grail effectively extracts CO2, which is then mineralized and converted into bricks for above-ground storage. This clever system not only efficiently captures carbon but also ensures its permanence through careful monitoring of these mineral formations.

**Core Technology:**
- **CO2 Capture:** The scrubbers are designed for lean manufacturing, allowing for rapid deployment with minimal labor involved. 
- **CO2 Storage:** By turning CO2 into a stable form, like bricks, they prevent it from re-entering the atmosphere—a clear win for long-term sustainability.

Holy Grail operates under various tags such as 'carbon-capture-and-removal,' 'climate-tech,' and 'hardware,' indicating their tech-driven approach to climate solutions.

**Support and Investment:**
The company has garnered solid backing, including notable investors like Kyle Vogt, Patrick Collison, and Ian Hogarth, to name a few. These connections lend not only financial assistance but also invaluable industry insights.

**Join the Movement:**
Holy Grail isn’t just for businesses; they encourage individuals to partake in the carbon capture initiative as well. Whether you’re a company or an individual, there’s a path for everyone to contribute to reducing atmospheric CO2 levels.

For more details, you can check them out at [Holy Grail's official website](https://www.holygrailcarbon.com).

In a world increasingly aware of climate issues, Holy Grail stands out as both a solution provider and an advocate for a sustainable future. It’s a classic case of tech stepping up where traditional solutions falter—a narrative worth following.
